38.eng-name: Chapters on the description of Paradise
38.ara-name: كتاب صفة الجنة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Anas narrated that the Messenger of Allah (s.a.w) said:"Paradise is surrounded by hardships, and the Fire is surrounded by desires

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ حُفَّتِ الْجَنَّةُ بِالْمَكَارِهِ وَحُفَّتِ النَّارُ بِالشَّهَوَاتِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related That "Paradise Is Surrounded with Hardships and the Fire Is Surrounded By Desires"
